text: 25:5 2 Atriviba 17:13; Jeremaia 18:11Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazir kaba ghaze, “Ia bar vaghvagh navibagh iragh, tuavir kurar ia gɨn zuim atakigh, egh arazir kurar ia amiba atakigh. Egh arazir kaba ateghtɨ, Ikiavɨra Itir God ia ateghtɨ, ia nguazir a ia ko ian ovavibagh anɨngizir nguazimɨn deraghvɨra ikɨ mamaghɨra ikiam.
